description: Create a new addon credits package. Accepts CreateAddonInput with id (required, String, unique identifier), name (required, String), credits (required, Int, number of credits), ratePerCredit (required, Float), price (required, Float), isActive (optional, Boolean, default true). Returns CreateAddonResponse with message (String), id (String). Raises ConflictError (409) if addon ID already exists. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if not SuperAdmin.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateAddon($input: CreateAddonInput!) { billing { createAddon(input: $input) { message id } } }
